settings.title: Megan
settings.member_description: Megan is a proud piggy parent to a herd of three, and makes pawesome artwork too!

settings.title: Hazel
settings.member_description: Hazel draws dazzling designs for products and packaging with regular breaks to lift her cats and sausage dog off the keyboard!

settings.title: Silvia
settings.member_description: Silvia is our in-house wordsmith - her writing helps our lovely pet parents look after their piggy pals!

settings.title: Estelle
settings.member_description: Estelle's pawfect translation skills make sure that our Parisian Pet Parents can join in the Kavee fun!

settings.title: Ashley
settings.member_description: Ash's furbulous artwork and photography skills have some questioning whether he is a designer, or a wizard!

settings.title: Melissa
settings.member_description: Melissa is pig-sessed, so she spends her time on Pigstagram and other pawsome social platforms!

settings.title: Ruthie
settings.member_description: Ruthie is our customer superstar, making sure every piggy and bunny parent leaves with a smile on their face and a happy wheek in their heart!

settings.title: Clem
settings.member_description: The head and heart of Kavee!

settings.title: Sophie
settings.member_description: Our very skilled organiser who makes sure everything runs smoothly!

settings.title: Max
settings.subheading: Director of Customer Service, People & Operations
settings.member_description: Max loves piggies and people, ensuring both are as happy as pig in a fleece blanket at Kavee!

settings.title: Holly
settings.member_description: Holly is our social media rockstar! With a passion for guinea pigs and rabbits, she's Kavee's ultimate hype queen!

settings.title: Charlotte
settings.member_description: Charlotte sends out our fabulous emails, keeping the Kavee family updated with what's going on!

settings.title: Bushra
settings.member_description: Bushra, as well as Maggie the Parrot and Jasmine the Cat, design some of the pawsome artwork you see across our site!
